# **title-en** : Insulation Repair and Installation Services
# **title-fr** : Services de réparation et d’installation d’isolants
## government-tender-metadata

## overview

[dit]
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for a standing offer to provide insulation repair and installation services at the Canadian Science Centre for Human and Animal Health (CSCHAH) and the JC Wilt Infectious Diseases Research Centre (JCWIDRC) in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

## Requirements

The scope of work includes:

- Provision of insulating materials
- Labor, supervision, material, and equipment necessary to complete the work and provide the services
- Installation and repair of insulation at the above-mentioned facilities

## Contract Details

- Contract term: three (3) years
- Extension option: two (2) additional one-year periods
- Security requirements: mandatory requirements, as outlined in Part 4 and 5 of the RFSO

## Qualification Criteria

- Lowest Price (selection criteria)

## Requirements and Security Exigences

- Mandatory security requirements
- Mandatory requirements outlined in Part 4 and 5 of the RFSO

## Procurement Details

- Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Regions of opportunity: None
- Regions of delivery: Winnipeg, Manitoba
